sentences.en: Bob and his family are on vacation; they've gone to Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃和他全家在度假, 他们去夏威夷了.

sentences.en: Cook is credited with discovering Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 人们把发现夏威夷的功劳归于库克。

sentences.en: Every summer we surf the beach of Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 每年夏天我们都到夏威夷的海滨去冲浪。

sentences.en: Ferdinand Marcos fled to Hawaii in 1986 after being deposed as president of the Philippines.
sentences.cn: 1986年，菲律宾总统费迪南德·马科斯被赶下台后逃往了夏威夷。
夏威夷吸引了许多旅游者.

sentences.en: Hawaii is an all - the - year - round tourist resort.
sentences.cn: 夏威夷 一年四季 都是旅游胜地.

sentences.en: Hawaii was the birthplace of surfing.
sentences.cn: 夏威夷是冲浪运动的发源地。

sentences.en: I always associate that song with my visit to Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 听到那支歌我就会联想到我的夏威夷之行.

sentences.en: I'm going to Hawaii for pleasure combined with business.
sentences.cn: 我准备去夏威夷玩玩,也办点事.

sentences.en: In Hawaii there are flowers all the year round.
Kappy was named Miss Hawaii in 1954.
sentences.cn: 卡皮被选为1954年的夏威夷小姐。

sentences.en: Many races are mixed in Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 在夏威夷,许多人种混居在一起.

sentences.en: The book ends on a lengthy description of Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 这本书以对夏威夷的冗长描述为结尾。

sentences.en: The ship made an unscheduled stop at Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 轮船临时停靠在夏威夷。

sentences.en: They agreed on Hawaii for this summer holiday.
sentences.cn: 他们一致决定今年暑假去夏威夷。

sentences.en: They saved for years for their trip of a lifetime to Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 为了一辈子能到夏威夷一游,他们储蓄了好几年.

sentences.en: They've hopped to Hawaii for holidays.
sentences.cn: 他们已坐飞机到夏威夷度假去了。

sentences.en: We had a three - day stopover in Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 我们在夏威夷停留了三天.
